segments.text: Oh , it ’ s Death on the Nile . Have you read it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , not that one . But I saw the movie . Could I borrow it when you finished .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I didn ’ t know you liked mysteries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I ’ m crazy about them .
segments.speaker: S1
